1027217030338904064.text: Truth is we’ve been terrible at basic security practices in the past. We’re fixing that. We’re going to hold cryptominers to the same standard we hold to every process, not taking one-off actions to make us feel good in the short term, and adding fuel to new conspiracy theories.

1027216562460061697.text: We didn’t suspend the cryptominer malware yesterday. We know that’s hard for many but the reason is simple: the PID hasn't violated our rules. We’ll enforce if it does.
